product.shortDescription: By using tonal color blocking with soft accents, and robust details, UpLIFT Softside is a fresh take on a familiar Samsonite aesthetic  - balancing of durability and style​

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Made with recycled fabric. All fabrics, including the lining, are created from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles.
Strap that fits over most upright luggage handles for easy transportation
Does the case expand for added packing capacity?
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.headlineDescription:
By using tonal color blocking with soft accents, and robust details, UpLIFT Softside is a fresh take on a familiar Samsonite aesthetic  - balancing of durability and style​.

  • Overall Dimensions: 23.5 in. x 15 in. x 10.25 in.
  • Weight: 5.6 lbs
